issue.title: [C++] Improving the Substrait-Python Handler
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16492](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16492). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A few important points were noted while developing the interface for Substrait-Consumer in Python. 

They are as follows;
1. Backpressure needs to be handled in the existing SubstraitConsumer wrapped to support Python.
1. Decide whether the substrait consumer should just allow the use of SinkNode directly or use ConsumingSinkNode.
